content:
TITLE: Development Commands
DESCRIPTION: Common development commands for installing dependencies, linting, type checking, and building all packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
bun install
bun lint
bun typecheck
bun run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with Bun
DESCRIPTION: Basic commands for setting up and managing the Nordcraft development environment using Bun package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
bun install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Hono Example Application in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server. It includes a predev step for copying static files to the assets/_static directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/examples/hono/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
bun run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Local Development Setup
DESCRIPTION: Command for linking local packages using Bun for local development and testing purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
bun run link
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Hono Example with Custom Project Template
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server with a specific project template from the 'examples/projects/' directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/examples/hono/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
template=medium bun run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Hono Example Server for Custom Element Testing
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Hono example server using the 'medium' template with Bun as the runtime environment. This must be executed before testing the custom element in a browser.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/examples/custom-element/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
template=medium bun run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Hono Example Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using Bun package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nordcraftengine/nordcraft/blob/main/examples/hono/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
bun install
```
